creator: Shaun Sutner
title: When AI-Powered Humanoid Robots Make Bad Choices

title: Opinion: Work With – Not Against – Shadow AI

creator: Graham Hope
title: New York Signs off on AI Safety Legislation

contentSnippet: The RAISE Act sets AI safety rules to be enacted Jan. 1 2027, and pushes against Trump's recent executive order to get rid of "excessive state regulation."
